price: Na yaliyo kusibuni siku yalipo pambana majeshi mawili yalikuwa kwa idhini ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na ili awajue Waumini.
arabic: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Enyi Waumini! Yaliyo kusibuni lilipo pambana jeshi lenu na jeshi la Washirikina katika Uhud yametokana kwa hukumu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na ili awadhihirishie watu Imani ya Waumini ya kweli aliyo ifunza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā aṣābakum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyaʿlama al-mu'minīna
